alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 2:14AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Johns, north central Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 213 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Cove Springs, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Green Cove Springs, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Durbin, Vilano Beach, Picolata, Switzerland, South Ponte Vedra and Crescent Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
